/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban setting. Streetlights stand tall, ready to illuminate the path as dusk falls. Buildings rise in the background, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue sky.
